projects.name: Row Home
description: RowHome redefines urban living by designing office spaces into the conversion of residential spaces from the ground up. This pioneering architectural project presents a novel concept where new office and residential units coexist harmoniously within a modular framework. Inspired by the dynamic SOHO style (Small Office/Home Office), RowHome offers a contemporary take on live-work environments, seamlessly blending professional and personal spaces for modern urban dwellers.
